MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Cilan, Sarn Bach and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 10:09 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of grounded overhead cables and a damaged electricity pole and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:11 pm on 16th March, 2021.
